Description: Papyrus fragment bearing a Coptic in red ink. 21 lines is written in two columns along the fibres and 22 lines in two columns against the fibres.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380701) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380701)
